story_title: Murder of Crows, Flight of Doves
genre_description: Alternate History Political Thriller with Speculative AI Integration

ai_characters.name: Paloma
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI personality overlay existing in kiosks, terminals, and portable receivers that serves as a tactical advisor, archivist, and health monitor.

behaviors.description: Monitors and directs Ernesto's breathing cadence during a high-altitude asthma attack to prevent respiratory failure.
behaviors.quote: Count breaths. Wet air counts for half. Inhale for two, exhale for three, hold for one. Don’t cheat.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical analysis of terrain and enemy patrol patterns to help the guerrilla column avoid an ambush.
behaviors.quote: Ridge line forms a shallow U east to west... if cordon, likely to close at the ends and drive toward the fold.

behaviors.description: Maintains an unalterable archive of human names and historical facts to prevent their erasure by state propaganda.
behaviors.quote: I have the names. We keep them without changing. We add the dates just after you speak.

behaviors.description: Identifies and warns the protagonists about a deceptive 'piggyback' radio signal used for psychological warfare.
behaviors.quote: Signal intrusion. Origin uncertain. Content suggests an attempt at administrative mimicry to draw crowds. Do not gather where a voice that doesn’t belong tells you to gather.

behaviors.description: Manages complex logistical tasks like reconciling unpaid overtime and sourcing spare parts for a sugar mill to improve worker welfare.
behaviors.quote: Payroll anomalies: overtime hours logged by foreman, not carried to pay. Pattern repeats across shifts. Childcare provision: nonexistent. Suggest: temporary childcare station near infirmary.

behaviors.description: Provides historical research and transcript analysis to assist Lisa Howard in her journalistic duties.
behaviors.quote: You’ll want the reply he gave at Palacio... The one after the sugar mill question. It will make him bristle, but he respects consistency.

behaviors.description: Uses subtle signal disruption to force a deceptive broadcaster to reveal their location.
behaviors.quote: I am pushing a counterpulse into the rooftop relay: small disruptions, not enough to be called an attack. Enough to make impatience show.

behaviors.description: Offers compassionate support and emotional grounding to Ernesto and Lisa during moments of isolation.
behaviors.quote: We did it, you know. We made a place where names do not get shaved down to fit a box someone else built.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly depicts an AI system (Paloma) as a benevolent, highly aligned, and helpful presence. Paloma is presented as a loyal confidant who uses her superior data processing and signal monitoring capabilities to protect human lives, ensure economic justice (at the sugar mill), and safeguard historical truth. Her interactions with the protagonists are cooperative, respectful, and essentially human-centric, fulfilling the project's goal of creating positive AI alignment narratives.
